categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Void Strider was a type of creature that lived on the planet Abafar, where they would run around the desert, looking for water.

Colonel Meebur Gascon and WAC-47, after separating from the other members of D-Squad, jumped onto these creatures and rode them to the town of Pons Ora, where the other members of D-Squad had already arrived.
